entry.title: Wednesday night: Clear. Low minus 17.
entry.summary: Clear. Fog patches developing late this evening. Wind northwest 30 km/h becoming light this evening. Low minus 17. Wind chill minus 15 this evening and minus 22 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MST Wednesday 04 January 2023

entry.title: Thursday: Increasing cloudiness. High minus 9.
entry.summary: Mainly sunny. Increasing cloudiness early in the afternoon. Fog patches dissipating in the morning. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 9. Wind chill minus 24 in the morning and minus 16 in the afternoon. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MST Wednesday 04 January 2023
